name: Ext_R5_MedicationRequest_renderedDosageInstruction
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.MedicationRequest.renderedDosageInstruction for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents MedicationRequest.renderedDosageInstruction from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicationRequest|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: Full representation of the dosage instructions
element.definition: The full representation of the dose of the medication included in all dosage instructions.  To be used when multiple dosage instructions are included to represent complex dosing such as increasing or tapering doses.
element.comment: `MedicationRequest.renderedDosageInstruction` has no related element in R4B:MedicationRequest
